results.deck: Tales of Eternia is the third game in Namco's series of JRPGs, originally released in the US as "Tales of Destiny 2" for the PlayStation.
results.description:
Tales of Eternia (renamed "Tales of Destiny II" in North America despite not being a sequel to Tales of Destiny -- for the actual sequel to that game, see Tales of Destiny 2) is a JRPG in the long-running Tales series developed by Namco Tales Studio for PlayStation. It was released in 2000 in Japan, and in 2001 in North America. A port for PlayStation Portable was released in 2005 in Japan, and in 2006 in Europe and Australia.

Mechanics

Tales of Eternia uses A-LMBS (Aggressive Linear Motion Battle System), a variant of the Tales series' Linear Motion Battle System.
results.name: Tales of Eternia
